<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Record DWARF file directives for later output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// According to PTX ISA, CUDA Toolkit documentation, 11.5.3. Debugging</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Directives: .file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/index.html#debugging-directives-file),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The .file directive is allowed only in the outermost scope, i.e., at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// same level as kernel and device function declarations. Also, the order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the .loc and .file directive does not matter, .file directives may follow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the .loc directives where the file is referenced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LLVM emits .file directives immediately the location debug info is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// emitted, i.e. they may be emitted inside functions. We gather all these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// directives and emit them outside of the sections and, thus, outside of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#a198691ea70afd22bfeb5e0830923beba">emitDwarfFileDirective</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#ab7ccb3b4d754b7e2ab62aca1113ab56d">changeSection</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;CurSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;Section,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     uint32&#95;t SubSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emit the bytes in \\p Data into the output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is used to emit bytes in \\p Data as sequence of .byte directives.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Makes sure that labels are mangled the same way as the actual symbols.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#ad3e4f5bb59058be7d568e2505d04b830">emitValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
